name: Irish Ice Cream Soda
description: Inspired by the knock-it-back-fast classic, the Irish Car Bomb, I came up with this beer float, using Guinness stout and Ben & Jerry's Dublin Mudslide. A marriage of alcohol and ice cream—what could be more delicious for St. Patrick's Day?
recipeIngredient: 1 generous scoop of Ben & Jerry's Dublin Mudslide ice cream

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon the ice cream into a pint glass. Pour in the beer, tilting the glass to reduce foaming. Drizzle with Bailey's and sprinkle with chocolate shavings.
